text: Silenus and Aegle with Mnasilo and Chromis is a monument in marble, from Carrara. Jean-Baptiste Boudard created it for the Ducal Garden of Parma, in 1765. The monument is also known as Silenus Group. In 1991, the monument was replaced by a copy, in marble powder and resin. The original is now in the cloister of the Fountain of the monastery of San Paolo. It is planned that the original should be placed inside the Eucherio Sanvitale building in the Ducal park .
title: Silenus Group
